name: Endstate
introduce: Endstate is ushering the world towards the future of product ownership by marrying physical products with NFTs. Starting with sneakers, Endstate creates unique customer experiences at the intersection of digital and physical. Endstate NFTs grant holders the ability to redeem their NFT for physical sneakers. Endstate embeds an NFC chip into the tongue of every sneaker, and proprietary encoding process definitively links each NFC chip to an NFT. This entanglement of physical and digital allows for token-gated in-person and digital experiences exclusively for Endstate holders.
